product_name: Timbuk2 Golden Gate Messenger Bag - Small - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Inspired by 1980s San Francisco, the small Timbuk2 Golden Gate Messenger Bag pairs nostalgic styling and colors with modern features like a laptop pocket. Bag features a retro Timbuk2 woven label, vintage-style metal cam buckle and 80's colors. Internal padded sleeve holds an iPad or up to an 11 in. MacBook Air. Flap has secure buckles and hook-and-loop closure; front organizer pocket has a hidden key ring. Timbuk2 Golden Gate Messenger Bag has a loop for attaching a blinking bike light for increased visibility. Small size is just right for daily needs. Closeout.
short_description: Inspired by 1980s San Francisco, the small Timbuk2 Golden Gate Messenger Bag pairs nostalgic styling and colors with modern features like a laptop pocket.
